Package be.helha.api_recettapp.services

Class RecipeComponentServiceDB

java.lang.Object
be.helha.api_recettapp.services.RecipeComponentServiceDB
All Implemented Interfaces:
IRecipeComponent
@Service @Primary public class RecipeComponentServiceDB extends Object implements IRecipeComponent
Service class for managing RecipeComponent entities, providing CRUD operations and database interactions.
